Member Function Documentation

std::string nextlimit::rf_sdk::GuiFilePickerDialog::show ( const OpType &  opType,
const std::string &  fullPath_DefaultDir,
const std::string &  filters,
const std::string  title 
)

show:

Show a dialog to browse for a file for either a load or save operation. Returns the full path of the chosen file or empty if nothing is selected.

Parameters:
[in]opType/ type of the intended use of the file to select. Valid types are [ FILE_PICKER_LOAD FILE_PICKER_SAVE ]
[in]fullPath_DefaultDir/ Default directory to browse
[in]filters/ a string that may contains several filters separated by ';' for instance ; "*.bin;*.pd" shows the files that end in bin or pd
[in]Title/ Title for the dialog
Returns:
: The full path of the file selected. Or "" if no file was selected
